structure.unit: Chapter 26 PARK AND RECREATION DEPARTMENT RULES AND REGULATIONS

text.section:
Sec. 26-35. CBO Grant Process.
Any Programming Partner with an unsatisfactory Performance Evaluation shall not be eligible for grant funding in accordance with A.O. 3-15. After receiving an "unsatisfactory" Performance Evaluation, the Programming Partner will have a designated period of time to improve. Once the Performance Evaluation has been brought up to a satisfactory level, the Programming Partner will become eligible for grant funding.
